ygData.subject: RE: Lambent OPINIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The only people getting worked up over this are those people who keep saying It s just a game.  And those same people get irritated over specific wording
ygData.messageBody:
> > people seem to get awfully worked up over a game... to the point of
> > coming across rude to people, the game ceases to be UN-fun (actually -
> > the game has always been fun for me - its some of the posts on this
> > list that bother me). Anyway, that was what I was
> > objecting to... NOT whether a person really does deserve or not deserve
> > things etc.... Anyway - I have said enough on this (its a good thing that
> > people don't HAVE to agree on things or this thread will never end).

The only people getting worked up over this are those people who
keep saying "It's just a game." And those same people get irritated
over specific wording from the posts, or if they don't completely
agree on a topic. Plus CAPITALIZING key WORDS shows frustration
as WELL. I'm pretty relaxed; not many things really bring me down
in the virtual life (email,games,usenet) That's just me - YMMV.

If someone has a gripe about me personally, let me know privately =)
(Do you know me personally? hehe)

Harmonic.
